fmapoverlay.description.config.names_ena: Enables custom height where the faction name displays.
fmapoverlay.description.config.names_hei: Sets the height where custom name get displayed
fmapoverlay.description.config.overlay_e: Enables custom height where the faction overlay displays.
fmapoverlay.description.config.overlay_h: Sets the height where custom overlay get displayed
